div.div: In order to raise awareness and attractiveness of the SSA, those actors and stakeholders who document a concrete contribution in terms of adopting the outcomes and deliverables of the project within their regional, national or European context, within the partner countries and beyond, are entitled to become part of the special Ambassadors Club. Awards of Ambassadors are issued within the framework of the SSA Annual International Conferences. Ambassadors Clubs foresee three distinct categories of stakeholders reflecting the structure of the partnership:

Coverage of Ambassadors would include a dedicated web page with the success story, shooting of a short video interview, case study with indepth analysis of the context in which the implementation of SSA deliverables have taken place and of the benefits secured for the organization represented by the Ambassador.
